classDiagramAnimal <|-- DuckAnimal <|-- FishAnimal <|-- ZebraAnimal : +int ageAnimal : +String genderAnimal: +isMammal()Animal: +mate()class Duck{+String beakColor+swim()+quack()}class Fish{-int sizeInFeet-canEat()}class Zebra{+bool is_wild+run()}The above quote is excerpted from Rob Pike’s talk during Gopherfest, November 18, 2015. ↩︎
